channel.title: PI - Questions
channel.description:
[b]1. Drop Rates[/b]
#Man 1:100 995:500 526:1 1:25 1050:1 1038:1
The first line of #man would all be 100%? The second line of #man would all be 25%?
[b]2. PvN Multi Combat[/b]
How do I make it so 2,3,4 and so on can all attack 1 npc?
[b]3. NPC Aggressive[/b]
How can I make a npc aggresive?
[b]4. Making a teleport premium only[/b] How do I make a teleport premium only.

item.title: PI - Questions
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Ok. For the more than one player attacking (multi combat).

You need to make a player area (like you were making a pk area) but only get the coords part of it and save that to use later. Then find isInMulti (player.java) and put the coords there. That should work!

Read full topic
